storyInfo: Ensia volunteers to climb up the mountain to fetch some medicine for a dying civilian, but runs into a snowstorm on the way back down. She has to ask for some unexpected help.

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: That crevice over there should be close enough...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Weiss, how long do you think it'll be before my brother comes back?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Based on what the Master said before the trip, about three or four more days.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Eh... That's still pretty far from now.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Huh? Is that him...?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: No wait, is it my sister?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The Saintess went to the Vine-Bear Court months ago. With everything she must attend to, there's no way she'd be here. No need to get antsy; I'll get the door.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Oh, Auntie Tarja! What brings you here?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: That's one step closer!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The cave's not really all that high up, so I should be there soon.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Tearstone?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It's a kind of light blue ore, only found in a cave halfway up Mount Karlan. Legend has it that it's the condensed tears of Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Almost there!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: So Uncle Tarja's condition got worse, the tearstone that was supposed to last over half a year was used up by autumn, and no one on either side of the mountain can lend him any more?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: How could this happen...?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: According to legend, tearstone can only be mined one palmful at a time, for that is the size of one of Kjeragandr's teardrops.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: If any more are extracted at once, then they lose their effectiveness.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: In fact, you were the one who retrieved the one Mister Tarja was using. That was two years ago though, so you might not remember it.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Oh, right, I remember now!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Weiss, think you could bring Auntie Tarja with you and drive around to see if anyone else has any tearstone?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Milady, you...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I'll keep looking around the house. I remember picking up a little one to use as a decoration, but can't remember where I put it.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Y-Yeah, I'm positive. As soon as I find it, I'll grind it down for Uncle Tarja and decoct it.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: And if you do manage to find one, you don't need to come tell me. Just head straight to the Tarja household.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Please be careful, milady.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It's... It's not like I'll be doing anything dangerous, just looking around the house! Anyway, get going already! Someone's life is on the line here!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I'll get the car ready. Missus Tarja, come with me.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Ensia turns her head and takes a look at the ashen-gray sky.
For now, the clouds aren't too dense, and not even a single sign of wind can be seen through the window.
Weiss's intuition is as sharp as ever.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: If it weren't for Uncle Tarja's emergency situation, he definitely wouldn't have left me alone.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Seriously, he's way too much of a worrywart. The snow won't be coming down hard until later in the evening anyway, and the cave isn't too high up. Just a quick climb up the cliff.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Welp, up we go!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Now all that's left is to head in and mine some tearstone. Shouldn't take long!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ensia closes her eyes and silently bows to the holy Mount Karlan.
Success! Fits perfectly, right inside my palm.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Still, I may have been pulling a fast one on Weiss, but tearstones are so pretty. Maybe I really should grab a few more for decoration next time...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: That said, I can still see the marks I made on the walls here two years ago. Nothing's changed at all.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ensia stands at the mouth of the cave and looks down the mountain. She can still see the smoke from the Tarja household.
Just wait for me. I'll get you your tearstone in no time flat!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Brrr, so cold!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The wind's kicking up?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Crap, that snowstorm's coming in a lot sooner than I thought.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Welp, can't get down the cliff anymore. Better take shelter in the cave and wait it out...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Wait, no. Uncle Tarja's still waiting for that tearstone, and who knows when the storm will stop?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I'll have to descend from the other side then.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hmm... This route seems usable, but which way am I...?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: This tree looks familiar... Wait, haven't I been here already?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I'll make a sign with my climbing rope. At least that way I won't be going in circles.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: This path is... going in the exact wrong direction.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ugh, this snow couldn't have come at a worse time.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I think I've come a pretty long way...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The cave is on the side of the mountain where it meets the lake, but I've been heading towards the lake this entire time...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I guess I'm already trespassing on Paleroche land then.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Stepping into another clan's territory without notice...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Even though her brother never went out of his way to discuss the other two clans with her, Ensia is no fool.
She knows that the Paleroche and Silverash clans have been at odds ever since Enciodes returned to Kjerag.
And before his latest trip, he specifically warned her not to have anything to do with the Paleroches unless absolutely necessary.
The situation in Kjerag was too delicate, and even a single careless whisper could trigger an avalanche.
Maybe I should turn back before they find me. Wait out the snow before heading back down...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: No, I can't risk it. Doesn't look like it'll be stopping anytime soon.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: This is a matter of life and death here! Time is of the essence!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: At least the snow's thick enough that I didn't get hurt by the fall...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hmm, I can see the settlements at the foot of the mountain.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: And the lake too.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Feels like I've been trekking through the mountain's backside for forever. How is there still more trail...?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I can't even see the lake anymore...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I can tell I'm still descending, but this trail is way too long
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Suddenly a figure emerges through the wind and snow and into Ensia's field of view, like a miracle.
Hello? Hello?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Can you hear me? I'm over here! Over here!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The figure notices her immediately and walks straight towards her.
Thank Kjeragandr! Are you a hunter from the mountains? How far are we from the bottom?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: If you follow this trail down, you'll be off the mountain in about an hour and a half.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: An hour and a half? Still that far?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: There wouldn't happen to be any shortcuts?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: There are, but none that can be used in a snowstorm this fierce.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: I have mountaineering equipment! See this big ole backpack? I've got an icepick, climbing ropes, rock nails, the whole shebang!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hmm... It could be worth a try then.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: If you head back a bit to where you just saw the lake, there's a steep little trail covered in snow.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: Thank you! By the way, I didn't get your...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Before Ensia could finish her words, there was nothing in her field of view except the wind and snow. As if Kjeragandr had deliberately hidden her guide from her.
She's gone?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Well, whatever. Let's head back and give this a shot!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It worked!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: That must've saved at least half an hour! Now to find a place where I can rent a burdenbeast or
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Stop! Who goes there?
attributes.name: Mountaineer

attributes.content: Hello, I don't mean any harm! I'm...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Huh? Aren't you the second daughter of the Silverash clan?
attributes.name: Mountaineer

attributes.content: I can explain, I
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hmph, I'm just patrol the mountain. Save your explanation for the head of our clan!
attributes.name: Mountaineer

attributes.content: The fragrance of the hot tea and sweets prepared by the servants still wafts from the table, but the two in the reception room do not sit, nor does a single drop or crumb pass their lips.
Tell me, what's going on here?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm sorry! I didn't mean to trespass into your territory!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Everyone who gets caught says that.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I mean it though...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: So you're telling me you were taking a walk in your backyard, enjoying the snow, and just happened to end up near the lake?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: No, I went to mine tearstone from a mountain cave, and it started snowing right as I was about to leave. Since I couldn't get down the cliff near my house, I headed the opposite direction, towards the lake.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Did you not see the dark clouds? You chose now of all times to mine your tearstone?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Ive heard enough.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: No, Mister Arctosz, let me explain
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The second daughter of the Silverash clan has trespassed on Paleroche territory.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'll have your brother explain the situation once he returns. If his answer satisfies me, I'll let you go.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: (He's going to wait for Enciodes?!)
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: (But Uncle Tarja is sick and can't wait any longer!)
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: (I need to get this medicine to him right away! Which means my only choice is to)
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: (But now that it's come to this, I don't know what Mister Arctosz's demands will be, or if my brother will be humiliated...)
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: (Damn it, none of this has anything to do with the clans! Just because I'm a Silverash...)
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: (I'm sorry, Enciodes! If this causes any trouble, I'll make it right, I swear!)
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Judging by the look on your face, it seems you have something to say.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I sincerely apologize for trespassing into the lake area, and I'll accept however you choose to handle this matter.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But I went to mine tearstone in order to save someone's life...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Using another's life as an excuse is an awfully tasteless joke, Ensia Silverash.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm not lying! Uncle Tarja, who lives in the mountains, is seriously ill and needs a tearstone to save his life. That's why I went up there!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I'll accept whatever punishment you have for me, but I ask only that you send an express train to deliver the tearstone in my backpack to the Tarja household in the mountains. Please, I'm begging you!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: If you claim to have mined tearstone, then show it to me.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hmm... this is certainly tearstone. But isn't it a bit too big?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: While I was up there, I made sure to test if it could fit in the palm of my hand.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: At least SOME of the Silverashes still remember a few of Kjeragandr's old teachings.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And you want me to deliver this to the Tarja household in the mountains, correct?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I suppose I can oblige.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Prepare the swiftest burdenbeast! I'll be heading to the mountains with Ensia Silverash!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: (Thank goodness...)
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: (Wait, back up, with ME?!)
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Mister Arctosz, do you mean to say...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: If the situation is as you described, then your trespass was truly unintentional.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Paleroche has no desire to raise a fuss over something like this.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I thought you would
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Would what?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: N-nothing, nothing at all!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Thank goodness...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You have my deepest gratitude, Mister Arctosz! If we waited any longer, we might've been too late! Truly, I can't thank you enough!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You harvested the tearstone. It was your life to save. There's nothing to thank me for.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: No, you deserve it! Would you like to stop by my house to rest for a bit? Uncle Matterhorn should be back shortly, and maybe I can let him
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Arctosz doesn't utter a word, simply gazing down at the excited Ensia like an immovable crag.
Sorry, I'm getting way ahead of myself.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Mister Arctosz...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Did you need anything else?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I still remember back before Enciodes returned. You were never close to me or my sister, but you didn't keep your distance from us like you do now.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: If anyone's responsible for that, it would be your dear old brother, don't you think? While I am willing to believe that you harbor no ill will, I dare not ignore the possibility that you're a part of his plans.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Nor do I dare assume that I can beat him in on the battlefield of political intrigue.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Is my brother... really that odious a person to everyone else?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I can tolerate his scheming, but I cannot turn a blind eye to him trampling all over our traditions.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But not everything from outside is bad! Like, what if there were a better cure for Uncle Tarja's illness in some
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ensia had only finished half her sentence when she sees the expression on Arctosz's face. She realizes then that a single gesture of aid from the patriarch of the Paleroche clan does not mean she has shortened the distance between them.
I can see that you and your brother are completely different kinds of people.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But both of you are true Silverashes.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Doesn't that also make you a true Paleroche?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ah, of course.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But you're still helping me.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Do you think I should have sentenced Tarja to death, or continued to detain you?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: No, no, that's not what I meant!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I just... don't quite understand.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Then keep mulling it over. You still have a long life ahead of you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hold onto your own stuff. You were so excited to leave that you forgot your bag.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Is that you, Lady Ensia?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Weiss? It's me! Over here!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I was worried sick about you
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Promise me you'll never do something that risky ever again!
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: But I'm perfectly fine, aren't I? The tearstone got delivered in time to boot. Maybe I ran into a snag or two along the way, but all's well that ends well.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ugh... You're just as stubborn as the Master.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: By the way, you may not know this, but part of the reason he left the country this time was to develop tearstone as a resource.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: How so?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: He'd already asked Victoria's scientists to study it earlier, and it turns out the reason tearstones can cure illnesses is because they contain a special substance.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: And taking more or less from the cave at once does not change its efficacy.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: If we can make an industry out of mining and refining tearstone, not only would that boost Kjerag's economy, but our medicine could also benefit people in other countries.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: You won't have to risk your life to harvest it anymore.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Upon hearing Weiss's words, Ensia couldn't help but think back to what she saw in the cave.
The crystal-clear tearstones embedded in the rock wall, almost pulling her into a trance. As if they really were Kjeragandr's tears.
Twice had she plucked them from that wall for Uncle Tarja's sake, and the traces of her theft were left clearly in those vacant holes.
They mingle with dozens of other such scars, each of indeterminate age.
Ensia suddenly becomes uneasy, as if there were a conflict between her brother's development plans and the pristine beauty of the cave.
In an attempt to dispel some of her unease, she tries to change the topic.
By the way, what are we doing for dinner?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I heard Matterhorn mention that today's entre will be braised beastmeat. I'm quite looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I didn't even realize I was hungry until now, but my stomach started growling as soon as you said that!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Glad to hear you have a healthy appetite. Anyway, I trust you'll sort out your mountaineering bag as usual, while I go help out in the kitchen?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Oh Weiss, you joker...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: This afternoon, you
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I was just about to thank you when you vanished without a trace before you could tell me your name!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Yet I arrived here all the same. Here, it's a letter for you.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: For me?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: From... my sister?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Allow me to introduce myself. I am the Saintess's head maid, but you can call me Kjarr.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Enya's head maid?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Could it be that she knew I'd be climbing the mountain today, and sent you to guide me?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: As if. I was heading down to do some shopping and bumped into you by chance.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Then, you'd better not tell her that I climbed down the mountain in the snow!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Let's see here... I wonder how she's doing in the Vine-Bear Court...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Phew, sounds like it's going well.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: By the way, Kjarr, thanks for delivering this! I'll tell Uncle Matterhorn to make dinner for
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Shh! I snuck in here.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Snuck in? But why?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Think about it. What would Weiss do if I graciously knocked on the front door, claiming to be the Saintess's head maid? He'd definitely report it to your brother.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: From Enciodes's perspective, people from the Vine-Bear Court slipping down to bring you mail when he's not around is more than enough reason to go on high alert.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Fair enough.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Anyway, I'll wait for him to return before I formally introduce myself to everyone in the family.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Gotcha.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Kjarr, this letter doesn't say anything about it, but Enya's still upset at him, right?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: To be honest, yes, I believe so.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Do you think she'll end up siding with Mister Arctosz in the end?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You've known the Saintess much longer than I have, and should know far more about her place in the Silverash clan than I do.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: She may be very upset at your brother, but you are still a sister to both of them.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Otherwise, you wouldn't be receiving this letter at all.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But she's now the Saintess of the Vine-Bear Court. Even if she wants to protect me, what can she do in our current situation...?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It's like how I had a run-in with Mister Arctosz today, and discovered that he's not a bad person at all.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: No matter who they are, as long as they're involved in the struggle for power or profit, they'll always
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: So that's what you're worried about.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Come. Let's cheer you up a bit first.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The Saintess's cheerful and optimistic little sister shouldn't be acting so gloomy.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The Saintess is not someone who will allow herself to be led around by emotions. She knows better than anyone how much responsibility sits on her shoulders.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But the actions she ends up taking depend not only on your brother, but also on you.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You are not his tool. You have your own path to walk. Choose it, and you will definitely have an influence on them both.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I can't promise anything, but it's possible that the path you take will eventually form the bridge between them.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I see... I'm starting to get what you mean.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Then I'll be heading back. It's hard keeping away from Weiss's prying eyes.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: So soon? I haven't even had a chance to properly thank you.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: We'll being seeing each other a lot more in the future.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Bye for now, Ensia.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: See you later, Kjarr!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ensia watches the door close in front of her and sighs softly, before painstakingly folding the opened letter back up and stowing it in her pocket.
She then turns around and begins to organize her backpack.
Halfway through, she feels something strange inside her bag.
She digs around and places what she finds in front of her.
Two pieces of candy.
One is from the Paleroche clan's reception room.
She racks her brain hard to figure out where the other piece came from. Only then does she recall eating it once as a child. It was found only at the Vine-Bear Court.
